history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: CV_radius_Reals_2. qsimpl time: 1 use: CV_radius_Reals_2. qsimpl time: 1 use: CV_radius_Reals_2,PSeries_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: CV_radius_Reals_2,PSeries_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: CV_radius_Reals_2,is_pseries_unique,PSeries_correct. qsimpl time: 1 use: CV_radius_Reals_2,is_pseries_unique,PSeries_correct.

exceptions.tactic: apply CV_radius_Reals_2 in H3 as [r1 Hr1].
apply CV_radius_Reals_2 in H4 as [r2 Hr2].
apply (is_pseries_plus a b x la lb) in H1.

Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), ex_pseries a x -> is_pseries a x (PSeries a x)" on hypothesis of type "is_series (fun n : nat => Rabs (a n * x ^ n)) x0".

Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), ex_pseries a x -> is_pseries a x (PSeries a x)" on hypothesis of type "forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), ex_pseries a x -> is_pseries a x (PSeries a x)".

original: intros H1 H2 H3 H4. apply CV_radius_Reals_2 in H3 as [r1 Hr1]. apply CV_radius_Reals_2 in H4 as [r2 Hr2]. apply (is_pseries_plus a b x la lb) in H1. - apply PSeries_correct in H1. apply PSeries_correct in H2. apply is_pseries_unique in H1. apply is_pseries_unique in H2. rewrite <- H1. rewrite <- H2. simpl. unfold PS_mult. apply PSeries_correct. admit. - apply H2.
